intro: Ruehssia laxiflora, commonly known as the slender-flowered ruehssia, is a flowering plant native to tropical regions of South America. It belongs to the family Rubiaceae, which includes many shrubs and herbs. The plant is characterized by its small, delicate flowers that are typically white or pale yellow. Its leaves are opposite and often have a slightly hairy texture. Ruehssia laxiflora is often found in moist, shaded environments such as forest understories.
